import React from 'react' import { DragDropContext, Droppable, Draggable } from 'react-beautiful-dnd'; import './css/heroCard.css' import gLogo from './img/GOOGL.png' import fb from './img/FB.png' import am from './img/AMZN.svg' function Herocard() { const getListStyle = isDraggingOver => ({ background: isDraggingOver ? 'lightblue' : 'lightgrey', display: 'flex', padding: grid, overflow: 'auto', }); return (
{(provided, snapshot) =>(
GOOgL

1515 USD

fb

1515 USD

amzn

1515 USD

)}
) } export default Herocard
